title: Polruan to Lantic Bay Walk Route

images.caption: Coast path approaching Polruan

description: This walk takes you from Polruant to Lantic Bay along a popular section of the South West Coast Path in Cornwall. It's about a 2 mile walk along an undulating cliff top path with excellent coastal views for the duration. The walk starts at the quay in Polruan and heads east to Lantic Bay where you'll find a beautiful secluded beach. The National Trust owned area is great for an afternoon picnic and a little paddle. You can extend the walk by heading to Pencarrow Head and Polperro on the Polperro to Polruan Walk .

details.subtitle: Further Information and Other Local Ideas
details.content: You can continue your exercise on the circular Lansallos and Lantivet Bay Walk which visits a wonderful scenic cove, a 15th century church and a picturesque beach waterfall.

display_address: Poltruan Quay, The Quay, Lanteglos, Polruan, Cornwall, England, PL23 1PJ, United Kingdom
